attributes.action: Review current censorship laws for media, particularly television, with regards offensive language use, violence and sexually explicit material.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned about the slip in standards, as evidenced in the Jonathan Ross and Russell Brand incident this week.  I am particuarly worried about the effect that this is having on the younger generation.  I think the media should reflect suitable standards and that trends such as the increase in swearing, graphic violence and sexually explicit material, with a trivialisation of subjects such as pornography, need to be regulated more stringently in order to protect our future generation.  It is a question of setting an example, not appealing to an audience.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
